email_intro: I am available for contracted design and development work, as well as co-founder roles.
If you have something specific in mind, email is the best method to contact me on.
Regrettably I do not have the time to respond to every enquiry - if I'm interested, I will get back to you.
twitter_intro: If you'd like to generally keep in contact, I'd be delighted for you to follow me on Twitter:
